scripts.typecheck: echo 'TypeScript checking will be available when projects are created'
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.build: echo 'Build will be available when projects are created'
scripts.test: echo 'Tests will be available when projects are created'
scripts.affected:build: echo 'Affected builds will be available when projects are created'
scripts.affected:test: echo 'Affected tests will be available when projects are created'
scripts.affected:lint: echo 'Affected linting will be available when projects are created'
